headerDisplay: To create Sleepme API keys, set up a developer account [here](https://docs.developer.sleep.me/docs/)

water_level_type.title: Low Water Level Alert Type
water_level_type.description: Select the alert device type for low water level.

slow_polling_interval_minutes.title: API Polling Interval (Minutes)
slow_polling_interval_minutes.description: Set the interval (in minutes) for passive polling of the Sleepme API.

api_request_interval_ms.title: API Request Interval (Milliseconds)
api_request_interval_ms.description: Minimum time between API requests (rate limiting).

max_api_retries.title: Maximum API Retries
max_api_retries.description: Number of times to retry a failed API request.

api_retry_backoff_ms.title: API Retry Backoff (Milliseconds)
api_retry_backoff_ms.description: Base time to wait before retrying a failed API request. Each retry will wait this amount multiplied by the retry count.
